newsitem.title: EU: Official Journal contents - OJ C 183 of June 17, 1997.
newsitem.headline: Official Journal contents - OJ C 183 of June 17, 1997.

text.p: (Note - contents are displayed in reverse order to that in the printed Journal)

Technology validation and transfer projects Call for proposals for technology validation and transfer projects under the specific programme for the dissemination and optimization of the results of activities in the field of research and technological development, including demonstration (1994 to 1998) (*) (97/C 183/17)

MAST III Call for proposals for RTD actions (supporting initiatives) for the specific programme for research, technological development and demonstration, in the field of marine science and technology (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/16)

MAST III Call for proposals for RTD actions for the specific programme for research, technological development and demonstration, in the field of marine science and technology (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/15)

Targeted Socio-Economic Research Programme Notice concerning the third call for proposals for the specific programme on research, technology development and demonstration in the area of Targeted Socio-Economic Research (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/14)

Call for proposals for RTD actions for the specific programme of research and technological development, including demonstration, in the field of training and mobility of researchers (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/13)

Third call for proposals for RTD actions for the specific programme for research and technological development, including demonstration, in the field of advanced communications technologies and services (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/12)

ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE PROGRAMME Call for proposals for RTD actions under the specific programme for research, technological development and demonstration in the field of environment and climate (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/11)

ENVIRONMENT AND CLIMATE PROGRAMME Call for proposals for RTD actions under the specific programme for research, technological development and demonstration in the field of environment and climate (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/10)

Notice concerning the sixth call for proposals for the specific programme of research, technological development and demonstration in the field of agriculture and fisheries (including agro-industry, food-technologies, forestry, aquaculture and rural development) (FAIR) (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/09)

Call for proposals for RTD actions for the specific programme for research and technological development, including demonstration, in the field of standards, measurements and testing (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/08)

Call for proposals for RTD actions contributing to the implementation of Community policies in the framework of the specific programme for research and technological development, including demonstration, in the field of standards, measurements and testing (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/07)
Call for proposals for the specific programme for research and technological development, including demonstration, in the field of information technologies (Esprit) (97/C 183/06)
Fourth call for proposals for RTD projects under the specific programme for research, technological development and demonstration in the field of biotechnology (1994 to 1998) (97/C 183/05)
Action E.II: Youth-related research Call for projects (17/97) (97/C 183/04)
Amendment to the notice of invitation to tender for the subsidy for the export of husked long grain rice to Reunion (97/C 183/03)
LIST OF DOCUMENTS FORWARDED BY THE COMMISSION TO THE COUNCIL DURING THE PERIOD 2 TO 6. 6. 1997 (97/C 183/02)
